```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)

# Read the data
data <- readRDS("~/final-project-group-11/dataset/cleaned_dataset.rds")

# Filter data for national estimates and focus only on relevant columns
national_data <- data %>%
  filter(Group == "National Estimate") %>%
  select(Indicator, `Time Period`, Value)


# Generate a line plot
p<-ggplot(national_data, aes(x = `Time Period`, y = Value, color = Indicator)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Trends of Indicators Over Time",
       x = "Time Period",
       y = "Average Value",
       color = "Indicator") +
  theme_minimal() 
#ggsave("line_plot.png", plot = p, width = 12, height = 8, dpi = 300)
p
```
